mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERWISH.PRODUCT_NO,PRODUCT_BRAND, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PRODUCT_DATE, DELIVERYFEE, PRODUCT_FABRIC, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_QUANTITY, PRODUCT_TITLE,MEMBERWISH_NO FROM MEMBERWISH,PRODUCT WHERE MEMBERWISH.PRODUCT_NO=PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO AND MEMBERWISH.WISH_COUNT=1 AND MEMBER_ID=#{memberid};
